verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> He was <S%G3004>telling<s%> them a <S%G3850>parable<s%> to show that at <S%G3842>all<s%> <S%G3842>times<s%> they <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%> and not to <S%G7051>lose<s%> <S%G7051>heart,<s%>
<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "There was in a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> a <S%G2923>judge<s%> who did not <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and did not <S%G1788>respect<s%> <S%G444>man.<s%>

"And there was a <S%G5503>widow<s%> in that <S%G4172>city,<s%> and she kept <S%G2064>coming<s%> to him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1556>'Give<s%> me <S%G1556>legal<s%> <S%G1556>protection<s%> from my <S%G476>opponent.<s%>'

"And for a <S%G5550>while<s%> he was <S%G3756>unwilling<s%><S%G2309>;<s%> but <S%G3326>afterward<s%> <S%G3778><s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2532>'Even<s%> <S%G1487>though<s%> I do not <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1788>respect<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%>

<S%G1065>yet<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G3930>bothers<s%> <S%G2873><s%> me, I will <S%G1556>give<s%> her <S%G1556>legal<s%> <S%G1556>protection,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> by <S%G1519>continually<s%> <S%G5056><s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> she <S%G5299>wear<s%> me out.' "
And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G191>"Hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G93>unrighteous<s%> <S%G2923>judge<s%> <S%G3004>said;<s%>

<S%G1161>now<s%> shall not <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4160>bring<s%> <S%G4160>about<s%> <S%G1557>justice<s%> for His <S%G1588>elect,<s%> who <S%G994>cry<s%> to Him <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night,<s%> and will He <S%G3114>delay<s%> <S%G3114>long<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them?

"I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you that He will <S%G4160>bring<s%> <S%G4160>about<s%> <S%G1557>justice<s%> for them <S%G5034>speedily.<s%> <S%G4133>However,<s%> when the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> will He <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%>?"

And He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> to <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5100>ones<s%> who <S%G3982>trusted<s%> in <S%G1438>themselves<s%> that they were <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> and <S%G1848>viewed<s%> <S%G3062>others<s%> with contempt: <S%G1848><s%>
<S%G1417>"Two<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up into the <S%G2413>temple<s%> to <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee,<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> a tax-gatherer.

"The <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> and was <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G3778>thus<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2316>'God,<s%> I <S%G2168>thank<s%> Thee that I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G5618>like<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G3062>people:<s%> <S%G727>swindlers,<s%> <S%G94>unjust,<s%> <S%G3432>adulterers,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> tax-gatherer.
'I <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G1364>twice<s%> a <S%G4521>week;<s%> I <S%G7503>pay<s%> <S%G7503>tithes<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> that I <S%G2932>get.<s%>'

"But the tax-gatherer, <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G3113>some<s%> <S%G3113>distance<s%> <S%G3113>away,<s%> was <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> <S%G2309><s%> to <S%G1869>lift<s%> up his <S%G3788>eyes<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> but was <S%G5180>beating<s%> his <S%G4738>breast,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2316>'God,<s%> be <S%G2433>merciful<s%> to me, the <S%G268>sinner!<s%>'

"I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to his <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G3844>rather<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G1565>other;<s%> for <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G5312>exalts<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5013>humbled,<s%> but he who <S%G5013>humbles<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5312>exalted.<s%>"

And they were <S%G4374>bringing<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> their <S%G1025>babies<s%> to Him <S%G2443>so<s%> that He might <S%G681>touch<s%> them, but when the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> it, they [began] <S%G2008>rebuking<s%> them.

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> for them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G863>"Permit<s%> the <S%G3813>children<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to Me, and do not <S%G2967>hinder<s%> them, for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1510>belongs<s%> to <S%G5108>such<s%> as <S%G5108>these.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> does not <S%G1209>receive<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G3813>child<s%> shall not <S%G1525>enter<s%> it [at all.]"

And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G758>ruler<s%> <S%G1905>questioned<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G18>"Good<s%> <S%G1320>Teacher,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> do you <S%G3004>call<s%> Me <S%G18>good<s%>? <S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> is <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1520>alone.<s%>

"You <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> 'Do not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> Do not <S%G5407>murder,<s%> Do not <S%G2813>steal,<s%> Do not <S%G5576>bear<s%> <S%G5576>false<s%> <S%G5576>witness,<s%> <S%G5091>Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother.<s%>'"
And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I have <S%G5442>kept<s%> from [my] <S%G3503>youth.<s%>"

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> [this,] He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1520>"One<s%> <S%G1520>thing<s%> you <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G3007>lack;<s%> <S%G4453>sell<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that you <S%G2192>possess,<s%> and <S%G1239>distribute<s%> it to the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> and you shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> and <S%G1204>come,<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> Me."
But when he had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> he <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G4036>very<s%> <S%G4036>sad;<s%> for he was <S%G4970>extremely<s%> <S%G4145>rich.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3708>looked<s%> at him and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G1423>hard<s%> it is for <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G5536>wealthy<s%> to <S%G1531>enter<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>

"For it is <S%G2123>easier<s%> for a <S%G2574>camel<s%> to <S%G1525>go<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5144>eye<s%> of a <S%G7027>needle,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for a <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G4145>man<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
And they who <S%G191>heard<s%> it <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2532>"Then<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> be <S%G4982>saved<s%>?"
But He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "The <S%G102>things<s%> <S%G102>impossible<s%> with <S%G444>men<s%> are <S%G1415>possible<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> we have <S%G863>left<s%> our <S%G2398>own<s%> [homes,] and <S%G190>followed<s%> You."

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, there is <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> has <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> for the <S%G1752>sake<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> shall not <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4179>many<s%> <S%G4179>times<s%> as <S%G4179>much<s%> at <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> and in the <S%G165>age<s%> to <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%> "

And He <S%G3880>took<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3880>aside<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> we are <S%G305>going<s%> up to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> which are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> about the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will be <S%G5055>accomplished.<s%>
"For He will be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> and will be <S%G1702>mocked<s%> and <S%G5195>mistreated<s%> and <S%G1716>spit<s%> upon,
and after they have <S%G3146>scourged<s%> Him, they will <S%G615>kill<s%> Him; and the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> He will <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%> "

And they <S%G4920>understood<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> and <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4487>saying<s%> was <S%G2928>hidden<s%> from them, and they did not <S%G1097>comprehend<s%> the things that were <S%G3004>said.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that as He was <S%G1448>approaching<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>man<s%> was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> by the <S%G3598>road,<s%> <S%G1871>begging.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> a <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G1279>going<s%> by, he [began] to <S%G4441>inquire<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> might be.
And they <S%G518>told<s%> him that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth<s%> was <S%G3928>passing<s%> by.
And he <S%G994>called<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2424>"Jesus,<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%> <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on me!"

And <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4254>led<s%> the <S%G4254>way<s%> were <S%G2008>sternly<s%> <S%G2008>telling<s%> him to be <S%G4601>quiet;<s%> but he kept <S%G2905>crying<s%> out <S%G4183>all<s%> the <S%G3123>more,<s%> <S%G5207>"Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%> <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on me!"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stopped<s%> and <S%G2753>commanded<s%> that he be <S%G71>brought<s%> to Him; and when he had <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near,<s%> He <S%G1905>questioned<s%> him,
<S%G5101>"What<s%> do you <S%G2309>want<s%> Me to <S%G4160>do<s%> for you?" And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> [I want] to <S%G308>regain<s%> my <S%G308>sight!<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G308>"Receive<s%> your <S%G308>sight;<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>made<s%> you <S%G4982>well.<s%>"

And <S%G3916>immediately<s%> he <S%G308>regained<s%> his <S%G308>sight,<s%> and [began] <S%G190>following<s%> Him, <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> and when <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> it, they <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G136>praise<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
